name: Professional Aviation Training Academy - Malta
about: Professional Aviation Training Academy – Malta (MSoF), established in 2004, is a leading institution in aviation training. Based at Malta International Airport, MSoF offers top-notch flight training in a professional environment, preparing aspiring pilots to meet the industry's rigorous demands. With over 15 years of experience and a 100% first-time pass rate for advanced courses, MSoF boasts Malta’s largest team of highly qualified instructors and a diverse fleet of training aircraft. The academy provides flexible training schedules, state-of-the-art facilities, and access to an Alsim ALX simulator. Certified by Transport Malta and recognized by the Malta Higher and Further Education Authority, MSoF is committed to delivering high-quality education, ensuring students become skilled, employable, and safe pilots.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School"]
